page.title: 18Children's Games in Lawshall
page.content: Through the summer time outdoor games tend to be influenced by the media coverage ie when Wimbledon is on lots of children are playing tennis in the garden.Swimming and roller skating at a nearby rink are very popular at present but these facilities are 6 miles away, and with the lack of public transport these pastimes always involve an adult taking the children by car.Traditional Â£baby'dolls,although still favoured by younger girls,have been replaced by teenage fashion dolls for the older girls,each having wardrobes of clothes, cars, horses even boyfriend dolls! The boys too,play with dolls,tough guy types of army dolls with there own jeeps,helicopters,camping kits and walkie-talkie sets. Indoor pastimes in- clude painting,colouring,board games, card games and computer and video games are extremely popular at present.
